segments.text: Ugh, that sink is a total mess with water gushing everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet left on, flooding the basin like it's nothing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water streaming down the cabinet doors, soaking everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle on the floor is spreading, gross and slippery.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the woman just stands there, oblivious in her wet spot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her towel and plate seem pointless amid this slop.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those kids raiding the cookie jar on that rickety stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's reach is clumsy, probably dropping crumbs everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl begging for one, adding to the sneaky chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cookies in a jar that's now accessible to their grubby hands.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is unkempt, contrasting the clean garden view.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand seeing such domestic disorder.
segments.speaker: PAR
